data.text: And bravo to Greg Wise (Willoughby from Sense and Sensibility) for being the perfect Lord Mountbatten. I missed seeing him on screen, and DAM he’s aged well! (You go Emma!)
Plus Victoria Hamilton (Lady Bertram from Mansfield Park) is perfect as the Queen mother. Whom was Helena Bonham Carter in the King’s Speech & Sylvia Sims in the Queen.
